summary: This is an email from July 7, 2019, forwarding a Twitter report by journalist Shimon Prokupecz that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey is part of the prosecution team in the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case. The email includes an urgent security request for case agents to accompany prosecutors to/from court and references Epstein's arrest in Teterboro, New Jersey.

persons.name: Shimon Prokupecz
persons.context: CNN reporter who tweeted that the daughter of James Comey is part of the prosecution team in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

persons.name: James Comey
persons.context: Former FBI director whose daughter is reported to be part of the prosecution team against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Billionaire arrested and expected to be charged in a sex trafficking scheme allegedly involving dozens of victims.

connections.description: Comey's daughter is reported to be part of the prosecution team in the Epstein case, creating a professional connection through the legal proceedings.

events.title: Epstein Arrest in Teterboro
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested in Teterboro, New Jersey, and is expected to be charged in a sex trafficking scheme allegedly involving dozens of victims.

events.title: Twitter Report on Comey's Daughter
events.description: Reporter Shimon Prokupecz tweets that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey is one of the prosecutors in the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Court Appearance Scheduled
events.description: Epstein is arrested for allegedly sex trafficking dozens of minors and will appear in court in New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested in Teterboro, New Jersey on July 6, 2019, for alleged sex trafficking of dozens of minors.
Reporter Shimon Prokupecz tweeted that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey is part of the prosecution team against Epstein.
The email contains an urgent security request for case agents to accompany prosecutors to and from court.
The document reflects heightened security concerns and media attention surrounding the Epstein prosecution in July 2019.
